name: 2Dark Souls
description:
This is a prototype for a 2D version of Dark Souls.  A small side project made for fun.

The finished product will not count the entire game, only the Northern Undead Asylum. 

Controls : 

 Q  -  Parry.

W  -  Roll.

E  -  Attack.

F  -  Chug that good Estus juice. 

R  -  Rest at bonfire.

Bear in mind that this does not reflect the final quality of the game on release.

Your comments and feedback are very welcome ! Thank you !
